Plot: This is a story of a man (Walker), suffering from dwarfism, who writes an autobiographical account of his life. In flashbacks, we see how he was conceived to a woman (Parillaud) at the end ...
Title: Frankie Starlight
Writer: Ronan O'Leary, Chet Raymo (novel), Chet Raymo (screenplay)
Actors: Corban Walker, Niall Toibin, Owen Roe, Gabriel Byrne
